title: Revisiting FLSA
summary: The newsletter discusses the revisitation of the Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) regarding firefighters, focusing on potential exemptions from overtime pay. It examines the application of the 7(k) exemption in cases like Anne Arundel County and evaluates the impact of amendments to FMLA and FLSA regulations.
